name: Curiosity - PS1 Style Indie Horror
description: Hello everyone! Well, I made a new ps1 style horror game (again). But I have improved a few graphics, optimization, story, quality and duration of the game. I think its passage will take from 12 minutes to 20-30. Movement: WASD There are also no interaction buttons like in the previous game. The game is not recommended for pregnant women, people with a weak psyche and just sick and weak people. I won’t write system requirements, but if the game goes to 32bit, then you need to understand that it will work even on weak PCs. I will be glad if you RATE THE GAME, and do not write that it is "normal" or "shit". Special thanks to you, who is going to shoot a video on it. And also if you liked the game, like and subscribe to my profile itch :D Good luck!https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOklL0NjyxFR6eBd_H04JAw
